title: Add multi-root support to nostrdb social graph
description: Extend ndb_socialgraph to support multiple root users. Modify set_root to accept array of pubkeys. Update distance calculation to use minimum distance from any root.

title: Implement first-launch pre-seeding
description: Detect first launch, load bundled data, seed nostrdb with kind 3+0 events, ensure social graph builds correctly

title: Create profile bundle generation script
description: Script to: set 9 root npubs, query users by distance 0-2, fetch kind 3+0 events, export to JSON/binary format for app bundling

title: Implement profile pre-cache with social graph (Issue #2637)
description: Pre-bundle contact lists and profiles using multi-root WOT scoring. Bundle kind 3 + kind 0 events for 100-1000 high-quality profiles. Seed nostrdb on first launch.

title: Explore Damus codebase for nostrdb integration
description: Understand: how Damus uses nostrdb, where profiles load, how to detect first launch, where to add pre-seed logic

title: Design bundle format and storage
description: Design format for bundled events (JSON vs binary). Determine bundle location in app. Plan efficient loading strategy.

title: Fix cursor jumping to end when pressing Return in text editor
description: Cursor jumps to end of text when user presses Return or Delete key while editing multi-paragraph notes. Issue affects TextViewWrapper.swift updateUIView function where cursor position is not properly preserved.
